name: The Dogsanity Abusive Experience #LD46
description:
The Dogsanity Abusive Experience is a funny house tycoon, where you have to keep an eye of your son and dog.. 

  • Max ( the dog ) is a very special one.. he feeds from 480 pounds  of food per day. Can you keep up the rythm?
  • Little Bobby Junior ( your son ) was bitten by Max, and got infected with some kind of bizzarre disease, which made his hair fall off.
  • Bob ( yourself ) is unemployed and he’s trying to do his best with a life of working and feeding people *and dog*
Featuring:
  • 3 different endings depending of your ability to not lose your mind
  • SECRET endings! … people couldn’t find it… Will you?
  • Drag and drop your furniture. Customize your creepy place :D
  • Work system
  • 9 unlockeable items! Get’em all!!!
  • Bizarre drawings and story. Not for everybody!
Ludum Dare 46 : "Keep it Alive"

The subject for this game jam made me think of a lot of ideas, this was the most factible one, based on the time restrictions. I wanted to make greater animations, and there is a lot of feedback missing yet.

Post Rush

The weekend was hard, as it was satisfactory. I did my best and now I am iterating over the same idea to make the game better.

Future plans

I am planning to make a humorous story of this family. I enjoyed developing the game, and making the characters. There are a lot of stuff to do with a bizarre universe like this.
